attributes.action: Stop the closure of Special Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by local authorities who are refusing referrals and placing obstacles against entry; and have upheld the parental right to choose the school they think is best able to serve the special educational needs of their children with complex learning disabilities and autism from mainstream, special day and residential schools in line with Government policy that "inclusion is not an agenda to close special schools", and to recognise that special schools in the maintained, non-maintained and independent sector form an important and necessary part in a second to none comprehensive education system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
